title: Melbourne's garden
brief_description: Colour studies of the Botanic Gardens; the many-coloured flowering shrubs, unending varieties of floral displays, shade of an oak lawn in summer, rockery plants providing brilliant colour, rose gardens with the newest varieties and the old favourites. The unusual foliage and blossoms to be found the Australian section; the delicate plant which flourish in the shelter of the glasshouses.
